My Research

The intersection between Music and Computer Science has been the sole focus of my academic career. My most prominent work has been developing μPSYC, a system for autonomously generating music using a psychology-based ruleset. I will regularly post the music it creates here.


μPsyc Compositions

4 bar compositions in C Major with I-IV-V-I chord progression
4 bar compositions in C Major with I-vi-ii-I chord progression
4 bar compositions in C Major with I-vi-IV-V chord progression

Publications

  • MU_PSYC: Music Psychology Enriched Genetic Algorithm
    Published in and presented at 2019 IEEE Congress on Evolutionary Computation (CEC)
